Trade/Device Name(s): D3 FastPoint L-DFA Influenza A/Influenza B Virus Identification Kit
D² FastPoint L-DFA Influenza A/Influenza B Virus Identification Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for D3 FastPoint L-DFA Influenza A/Influenza B Virus Identification Kit, a direct immunofluorescence assay for detection of influenza A and B in respiratory specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative identification of influenza A and influenza B viruses in nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs and aspirates/washes from patients with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection by direct immunofluorescence.
